name: Project Chorus Flanger
description:
Top-down shooter, where you shoot with the music! Set in the distant future, where robots play pretend as cowboys while listening to some great music

The protagonist is Chorus Flanger, a cowboy out for revenge. With a record player in his chest, the music it plays dictates his every move

Join us for this next guaranteed great indie classic, and listen to some banging tunes!

Here's a link to our website!

https://www.manatee-studios.com/
